metadata.title: DMSP F12 Level and Brightness Temperatures, and Radiosonde Profiles from the Special Sensor Microwave Temperature Sounder (SSM/T)

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data
Information Service (NESDIS), Office of Satellite Data Processing

metadata.description: The parameters in this data set are level temperatures, brightness temperatures and radiosonde profiles. The radiosonde profiles and the temperature retrievals from F12 are matched in space and time. The spacecraft F12 data resides in a rotating file at the Office of Satellite Data Processing and Distribution (OSDPD) in Suitland, Maryland. The historical data for F12 also resides at OSDPD.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To archive radiosonde profiles and temperature retrievals.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown
